name: @bt-dsl/formatter
description: Prettier plugin for BT DSL using core parser (WASM)

scripts.prebuild: mkdir -p dist && cp ../core/build-wasm/formatter_wasm.js dist/ && cp ../core/build-wasm/formatter_wasm.wasm dist/
scripts.test: node dist/test/test-format.js && node dist/test/test-standard-nodes.js && node dist/test/test-params.js && node dist/test/test-comment-preservation.js && node dist/test/test-extern-parens.js && node dist/test/test-wasm-relocation.js && node dist/test/test-malformed-input.js && node dist/test/test-trailing-comments.js && node dist/test/test-argument-comments.js
